code: import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{useEffect}from"react";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Auth(){const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{var path=window.location.pathname;if(path==="/admin"||path==="/manageusers"||path==="/AddCategory"){if(!localStorage.getItem("token")||localStorage.getItem("role")!=="admin")navigate("/logout");}else if(path==="/user"||path==="/cpuser"||path==="/epuser"){if(!localStorage.getItem("token")||localStorage.getItem("role")!=="user")navigate("/logout");}else{if(localStorage.getItem("role")==="admin")navigate("/admin");else if(localStorage.getItem("role")==="user")navigate("/user");else navigate("/");}},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{});}export default Auth;
